title: 5.2 Master Challenge 1
question:
Miss Rose is a librarian. She prepares an Excel worksheet to manage the different categories of books.

1. Prepare a similar worksheet in Excel.
2. Select the entire worksheet and resize the rows and columns

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
